title: Kain Panjang (long Sarong), 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
description: Long sarong (kain panjang) printed with an all-over pattern of sparsely used flower and leaf designs in white-dotted indigo blue and brown on a light tan ground, which is evenly divided into small all-over geometric pattern of diagonally striped squares ("isen" motif).

tombstone.epitaph:
Kain Panjang (long Sarong), 19th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. Gift of Harvey Smith. 1968-135-96.
